resources.string: Please try to keep your device close to the router and ensure that the network environment is good
No device information yet, please bind the device
No pet information yet, please add a pet
Current Device: MS Intelligent Pet Cat Litter Basin
Current Device: MS Intelligent Pet Feeder
Select the device to get more functionality
The device is coming online soon, so stay tuned
More devices will be supported soon, so stay tunedï½ž
Confirm to delete this pet information?
The password must not be less than 8 digits
1. After the feeder is turned on, it is connected to the network named mspet with the password of 12345678.
2. Enter the WiFi name and password that the feeder wants to connect to below (please make sure you enter it correctly before continuing).
3. After all input is completed, click send WiFi information below, wait about 5 seconds, and the device will restart automatically.

4. When the device is restarted, the feeder will make a click sound, and wait about 10 seconds after the restart. If the indicator light is always on, it means that the WiFi connection is successful. If the indicator light is long and dark, it means that the WiFi connection is failed. Please press the button under the WiFi indicator light for about 10 seconds, and then the device will restart automatically. Repeat the above steps after the restart.
The device to be bound currently has no primary user. After confirming the binding, you will automatically become the primary user. Do you confirm the binding?
The current device to be bound already has a primary user, so we need to apply to the primary user. Are you sure to apply for binding?
No device information yet, please bind the device
For the moment, only one device can be bound. If you want to change the bound device, please unbind it first
